protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-1210
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated from whole plants using a phenol extraction protocol as described in Jackson and Larkins (1976) Influence of Ionic strength, pH and chelation of divalent metals on isolation of polyribosomes from tobacco leaves. Plant Physiol. 57: 5-10.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-2613
protocol.text: Expression analysis was performed with the Affymetrix Microarray Suite software (version 5.0) set at default values with a target intensity set to 150.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-55928
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana seeds of AS-hyg genotype (Columbia ecotype) and the FN-created cli186 mutants were surface-sterilized, plated on designated media and stratified for 48 hours at 4C. Plants were grown on tissue culture plates under continuous darkness at a constant temperature of 23 C on basal Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium that was supplemented with 2 mM KNO3 and +/- 1% sucrose.  After 7 days dark growth half of the plants (AS-hyg and cli186) on 0% or 1% sucrose were placed into white light for 3 hours while other half of seedlings on 0% or 1% sucrose plates were maintained in the dark.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-55929
protocol.text: Seven day etiolated seedlings of the AS-hyg genotype and the cli186 mutant were germinated and maintained on basal MS media that contained no sucrose.  These plants were maintained in the dark for 7 days and three hours.  Following this treatment, whole seedlings were harvested, immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at -80C until further use.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-55930
protocol.text: Seven day etiolated seedlings of the AS-hyg genotype and the cli186 mutant were germinated and maintained on basal MS media that contained 1% sucrose.  These plants were maintained in the dark for 7 days and three hours.  Following this treatment, whole seedlings were harvested, immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at -80C until further use.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-55931
protocol.text: Seven day etiolated seedlings of the AS-hyg genotype and the cli186 mutant were germinated and maintained on basal MS media that contained 1% sucrose.  These plants were maintained in the dark for 7 days and were then treated with white light for an additional three hours.  Following this treatment, whole seedlings were harvested, immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at -80C until further use.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-55932
protocol.text: Seven day etiolated seedlings of the AS-hyg genotype and the cli186 mutant were germinated and maintained on basal MS media that contained no sucrose.  These plants were maintained in the dark for 7 days and then treated with white light for an additional three hours.  Following this treatment, whole seedlings were harvested, immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at -80C until further use.
